Total Daily Sale:
Query : select Orders.order_date, sum(Medium.quantity*Medium.price) from Orders inner join Medium on Medium.order_id=Orders.order_id group by order_date;

Total Daily Profit:

Find the average order size per customer:

Query: select c.customer_id, avg(m.quantity) from Customers c, Orders o, Medium m where o.customer_id=c.customer_id and m.order_id=o.order_id group by c.customer_id;

118	31.73913043478261
119	34.266666666666666
120	29.75
121	38.611111111111114
122	34.3125


Delete an order:
Query:
update Orders set Orders.`is_available`=0 where Orders.order_id=1;

Submit an order:
Query:
update Orders set Orders.status="Complete" where Orders.order_id=1;
